text:
For a pneumatic actuated brake system a team is using a pressure bottle with an relative pressure of 50 bar with respect to the atmosphere and a total inner volume of 4 litre. Consider a portion if gas, which at 1 bar absolut atmospheric pressure world fill a volume of 0.02mÂ³ is missing in the bottle. What would be the new relative pressure with respect to the atmosphere in the bottle?
Enter the solution in bar and round solution to one decimal place.
